instructions.text: Say START to begin after putting on the VR headset.

text.question: Which image was the sharpest?
text.understood: Image {0} was the sharpest. Understood. Thank you.
text.text: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin.
text.end: The setting is finished. Please remove the VR goggles.
